# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(cxxgen LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
add_executable(cxxgen "")
set_target_properties(cxxgen PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "cxxgen")
set_target_properties(cxxgen PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/linux/x86_64/debug")
target_compile_options(cxxgen PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-fno-rtti>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-fno-rtti>
)
set_target_properties(cxxgen PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(cxxgen PRIVATE cxx_std_20)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(cxxgen PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Debug>:-Od>)
else()
    target_compile_options(cxxgen PRIVATE -O0)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(cxxgen PRIVATE -Zi)
else()
    target_compile_options(cxxgen PRIVATE -g)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET cxxgen PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(cxxgen PRIVATE
    clang-cpp
    fmt
)
target_link_directories(cxxgen PRIVATE
    /usr/local/lib
    /usr/lib
)
target_link_options(cxxgen PRIVATE
    -m64
)
target_sources(cxxgen PRIVATE
    src/main.cpp
    src/matcher.cpp
)
